episodes.title: Westboro Brimstone Cult (Part 1): The Gospel of St Hate | HATE Ep4
episodes.description:
In this first installment of our two-part deep dive, we unravel the origins of one of the most infamous hate groups in modern American history: the Westboro Baptist Church. We’ll explore Fred Phelps’s twisted evolution from civil rights lawyer to brimstone-obsessed patriarch of a cult built on cruelty, and the roots of the Church’s anti-gay crusade.

We’ll also fact-check one of the internet’s most persistent myths: Did Ricki Lake really throw Fred Phelps off her show in 1993? We’ve got the receipts.

Expect uncomfortable truths, survivor insights, and a whole lot of righteous anger. This isn’t a church. It’s a cult. And we’re not pulling any punches.

TOPICS COVERED:
* Fred Phelps’s early years & family indoctrination
* The launch of the WBC hate campaign
* That notorious Ricki Lake episode (and what really happened)
* How memory distorts history—and why truth matters

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ACMQpod
